thread.title: EU's Tusk says 'unanimous' agreement for Greece bailout deal
thread.title_full: EU's Tusk says 'unanimous' agreement for Greece bailout deal

title: EU's Tusk says 'unanimous' agreement for Greece bailout deal
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 13, 2015, 08:25 BST - UK Markets close in 8 hrs 5 mins EU's Tusk says 'unanimous' agreement for Greece bailout deal AFP – 15 minutes ago View Photo 

EU President Donald Tusk said Monday that eurozone leaders had reached a unanimous deal to offer Greece a third bailout and keep it in the euro after 17 hours of marathon talks. 
"EuroSummit has unanimously reached agreement. All ready to go for ESM programme for Greece with serious reforms and financial support," Tusk said, referring to the EU's bailout fund that will oversee the third Greek bailout since 2010.
